member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITesting.CodedUITestAttribute
member.summary: Used to activate the extension so that we recognize a class as Unit Test extension class. Use [CodedUITest] attribute in test class to indicate that it is a Coded UI Test

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITesting.CodedUITestType
member.summary: Represents the CodedUITest type for a test class.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITesting.CodedUITestType.Desktop
member.summary: CodedUITest type that represents testing of Desktop Applications.
